title: Microsoft bookshelf '94 (PC)
brief_description: A compendium of reference material that includes the American Heritage Dictionary; the Roget’s Thesaurus; Colombia Dictionary of Quotations; the Concise Columbia Encyclopedia; Hammond World Atlas; the People’s Chronology; and the World Almanac. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor; 4 Mb of memory; 2 Mb of hard-disk space; CD-Rom drive; audio board; VGA display; Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
